set_justdo_name_subtitle: Simply click on the title to enter edit mode
create_first_task_subtitle: To create tasks, you can either use the buttons on toolbar, or use keyboard shortcut ALT+ENTER / ALT+SHIFT+ENTER
invite_members_subtitle: Invite your team members to join and collaborate in your new JustDo
import_tasks_subtitle: You can transfer existing tasks and data to JustDo and continue seamlessly with our spreadsheet import function
customize_columns_subtitle: Control what you see on the grid by adding/removing columns, filtering tasks by their status, and more!
free_support_request_received: Received, we'll get back to you shortly by email
